content: celtic denim sock by judy sumner materials 1 skein lorna s laces shepherd sock or solemate 1 set of 5 sized 1 dp needles or size to obtain gauge gauge 8 sts = 1 in stockinette abbreviations 1/1 rc - slip 1 st to cable needle hold at back knit next st and then knit st from cable needle 1/1 lc - slip 1 st to cable needle hold at front knit next st and then knit st from cable needle 1/1 rcp - slip 1 st to cable needle hold at back knit next st and then purl st from cable needle 1/1 lcp - slip 1 st to cable needle hold at front purl next st and then knit st from cable needle pattern row 1 - p1 k2 p2 1/1rc p2 1/1/rc p2 k2 p1 row 2 4 6 and 8 - knit the knit sts and purl the purl sts row 3 - p1 k2 p1 1/1rcp 1/1/lcp 2x p1 k2 p1 row 5 - p1 k2 p1 k1 p2 1/1/lc p2 k1 p1 k2 p1 row 7 - p1 k2 p1 1/1lcp 1/1rcp 2x p1 k2 p1 directions cast on 64 sts over 4 needles 16 on each of four needles join being careful not to twist sts begin pattern and work until 6 or desired length from beginning for sock top end with an odd numbered row work across needle one and turn work heel flap sl 1 then purl remaining sts across needles 1 and 4 place all stitches on one needle for heel flap row 2 sl 1 k1 across needle repeat the last two row completing 23 row ending with a purl row and right side facing you turn heel row 1 sl 1 k17 skp slip knit and pass slip_stitch over k 1 turn work row 2 sl 1 p 5 p 2 decrease p 1 turn row 3 sl 1 k 6 skp k 1 turn row 4 sl 1 p 7 p 2 decrease p 1 turn continue in this manner working one more stitch before decrease on each row until all sts have been worked 18 sts remain knit across and begin gussets gussets pick up 12 sts along the side of the heel flap m 1 in loop between heel flap and instep needle work pattern across two instep needles m 1 in loop between instep needle and heel flap pick up 12 sts along other side of heel flap divide heel sts between needles 1 and 4 work 1 row around knitting m 1 st with the last st on each side of the gusset and maintaining pattern on instep needles decrease round knit to 3 sts from end of firstneedles skp k1 work pattern on instep sts k1 k2 decrease knit remaining sts on fourth needle work one round with no decrease always maintaining pattern on instep repeat these two rounds until heel needles 1 & 4 have 16 sts on each needle foot
